publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-475 Johann Lamont: Congratulations to the Scottish Football Team—That the Parliament congratulates the Scottish football team on its magnificent result against France and wishes the team, the manager and all Scottish supporters every success for the remaining matches to secure qualification for the European championships.

S3M-475 Johann Lamont: Congratulations to the Scottish Football Team—That the Parliament congratulates the Scottish football team on its magnificent result against France and wishes the team, the manager and all Scottish supporters every success for the remaining matches to secure qualification for the European championships.
S3M-475 Congratulations to the Scottish Football Team (lodged on 13 September 2007) Rhoda Grant*
